description: This source file defines the AppState class, which extends ChangeNotifier to manage global application state including a reference to LocalStorageService and an initialization flag.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: A container for global flags and service references, extending ChangeNotifier for state management in Flutter.

methods.name: AppState
methods.description: Constructor for initializing AppState with a required LocalStorageService.

methods.name: initialized
methods.description: Getter for the _initialized flag indicating if the app has been initialized.
